title: r/Maliciouscompliance "Hit Me HARD!" "lol sure"
description:
r/Maliciouscompliance In today's episode, a creepy martial arts instructor shows up at a school to teach kids about self defense. The guy is incredibly smug, and to make matters worse he gets a bit touchy-feely with some of the girls that the's teaching. So, when he spars with a girl student and he tells her to hit him as hard as she can, she does exactly that and lands a kick square into the family jewels. Be careful what you wish for, Mr. Karate guy! If you like this podcast and want to see more, follow my podcast for more daily Reddit content!
